title: Ginga Shippuu Sasuraiger (Galactic Gale Sasuraiger)
synopsis: It is 2911 and the solar system is made up of of 50 planets. I.C Blues, a gambler, makes a bet with the boss of a criminal syndicate known as Bloody God that it is possible to navigate the whole solar system in one year. Helping out Blues is J9-III, made up of Rock, Beat, and Birdy. To clear any obstcles, they have the transforming train-robot Sasuraiger. But the Bloody Syndicate will do anything to ensure the Blues loses the bet.
characters: ['Shaw, Birdy', 'Blues, I.C.', 'MacKenzie, Beat', 'Anlock, Rock', 'Chang, Suzy', 'Kenjo, Jimmy', 'God, Bloody', 'Aurgan, Inspector', 'Richman, D.D.']
voices: ['Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Sogabe, Kazuyuki', 'Mori, Katsuji', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Miura, Masako', 'Shioya, Yoku', 'Kanie, Eiji', 'Tokumaru, Kan', 'Yanami, Jouji']
staff: [['Yotsuji, Takao', ['Director']], ['Yamauchi, Shigeyasu', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Hisaishi, Joe', ['Music']], ['Komatsubara, Kazuo', ['Character Design']]]
